post.author: 코스카
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 3K CONSULTING

주소 Canada Ontario  
  Toronto

홈페이지  

회사소개 Placement Agency


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Database administrator (Oracle DBA)

고용형태 Permanent, Full Time  

모집기간  As soon as possible

급여 To be negotiated

근무지 Canada   Ontario High Park / Parkdale (Toronto)  


지원자격
학력 Some university  

자격증 Project Management Professional (PMP)

경력 6 - 9 years

필요한기술 Dbase, Oracle / PL-SQL / CASE / Developer 2000 / Ingres

기타 We are looking for a leading edge Oracle DBA who has experience with the Oracle ERP suit. We would need someone who had:Oracle 11i ApplicationsOracle 9i Databasesome Oracle Architecture experienceworked on Oracle in a Sun environmenthas worked with Oracle RAChas worked with Sun Cluster


지원방법
지원방법 By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 - -  

이메일3k.consulting@rogers.com
post.title: Database administrator (Oracle DBA)-구 게시판 김 유나님이 올리신글
